description:
For those rides where you don’t want to forget the essentials but may not want to carry. This mini luggage rack mounts directly to your frame and secures the items you’ll need for your next adventure.

  • Two sizes of durable set-off cinch straps are included to customize what you carry
  • Mounts to water bottle bosses or SmartSense mounting points on select Cannondale models
  • Fits inner tubes, tools, food and other ride essentials
  • Hardware included
name: Cannondale StrapRack Storage Mount
